Fadika Kramo-Lanciné (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri sị Ivory Coast yana onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na akụkọ ifo.
A mụrụ Kramo-Lanciné na Danané na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ivory Coast na 1948. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Abidjan na mba ya, wee mụọ ihe nkiri na Louis Lumière School na Paris, France
Kramo-Lanciné sonyeere National Office of Rural Promotion na 1975 wee lekọta ihe nkiri agụmakwụkwọ na mmemme telivishọn na nsogbu mmepe.
Ọrụ mbụ ya, La Fin de la Course, bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke nkeji iri na anọ nke e duziri na 1974

Mgbe ọ sonyechara n'ọfịs nke nkwalite ime obodo, Kramo-Lanciné duziri ihe nkiri nkuzi na ihe ngosi telivishọn iri na abụọ n'etiti afọ 1975 na 1981. N'afọ 1978, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Djéli, conte d'aujourd'hui ma ọ bụ Djeli: akụkọ nke taa, site n'enyemaka nke otu ndị ọrụ telivishọn

Emechara ya na 1981, Djéli natara Grand Prix (Yennenga Stallion) na 7th Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou, nke a makwaara dị ka onyinye FESPACO. N'afọ 1993, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta Wariko, Le gros lot ma ọ bụ Wariko, the Jackpot
Ihe nkiri ahụ na-akọ akụkọ banyere onye uwe ojii okporo ụzọ dara ogbenye nke meriri lọtrị ahụ, naanị iji chọpụta na tiketi mmeri ya efuola.
Site n'afo 2013 ruo 2016 Kramo-Lanciné bụ onye nduzi nke National Cinematography nke Côte d'Ivoire, ma kemgbe 2016 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ maka ihe nkiri na Ministry of Francophone Culture.
N'afọ 2017, e guzobere ihe oyiyi nke Kramo-Lanciné n'okporo ámá nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Ouagadougou iji cheta ihe ndị ọ rụzuru na ihe nkiri.
